channel.title: CTF this weekend! (Aug 25th-26th)
channel.description:
NiHwk CTF https://ctf2018.nihwk.net/
25 Aug., 08:00 UTC — 26 Aug. 2018, 23:00 UTC
Shoutout of the week goes to Pyhscript for their hard work in creating a writeup for last weeks CTF on a [web attack involving a Directory Traversal](https://0x00sec.org/t/whitehatvn-grandprix-ctf-web01-writeup/8138)
Come join the fun and learning experience! All noobs and skids welcome! As it is a competition, the real competition will always be in the mirror. Long as you're learning something, we're here to help and provide resources, not answers. :)
Team name : 0x00sec Secret code: 0x00nihwk
Also hop on our IRC irc.0x00sec.org/ 4 and join #ctf
